name: Blue Cheese, Pear, and Hazelnut Smørrebrød (Danish Open-Faced Sandwich)
description: Cheese smørrebrød (Danish open-faced sandwich) are eaten to conclude a meal. This version with tangy blue cheese, mellow pear, and toasted hazelnuts is sweet without being cloying.
recipeIngredient: 1 slice rugbrød (dense Danish sourdough rye bread), about 1/3-inch thick

recipeInstructions.text: If not already trimmed, cut rye bread to a 3- by 5-inch rectangle.
Spread butter evenly all over top side of bread.
Arrange pear slices on bread so that they overlap slightly. Top with crumbled blue cheese and finish with toasted hazelnuts. Serve right away.
